    • getAccount

      Accounts getAccount(int id)
      Retrieves an account from the database via id.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the contact to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The account with the given id, or null if not found.

    • getAccountWithEmail

      Accounts getAccountWithEmail(String email)
      Retrieves an account from the database via email.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the contact to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The account with the given email, or null if not found.

    • getAccountWithUsername

      Accounts getAccountWithUsername(String username)
      Retrieves an account from the database via username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the contact to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The account with the given username, or null if not found.

      List<Accounts> getAllContacts()
      Retrieves all accounts from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all accounts in the database.
